title: Skateboarding and Scootering Spots
name: Skateboarding and Scootering Spots
description:
A Map by Motorider420

This is going to continually grow with spots for Skateboarding and Scootering (scooters are basically skateboards with handles and [sometimes] front suspension)!!!  Each spot will have a description; 4-stair, elbow, ledge, ramp, Qpipe, etc...  The spots will also have a tolerance description, meaning how easy it is to get kicked out and how they go about doing it...

properties.name: 1-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Depends on if anybody is there or not, if nobody is there, you won\'t be bothered!!!

properties.name: 2-Stair then 1-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Allmost never anybody here, we have never seen anybody, so we can\'t help you if you do!!!

properties.name: 2ft Gap
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420If nobody is around, especially parked cars, you won\'t be bothered, its a peninsula with curbs on both sides and grass in the middle!!!

properties.name: 3-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Allmost never anybody here, we have never seen anybody, so we can\'t help you if you do!!!

properties.name: 3-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Depends on when you go, if nobody is there, you\'ll never be bothered!!!

properties.name: 4-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420I believe thats it 4, but no-one will bother you, just watch out for cars!!!

properties.name: 4-Stair and Smooth Concrete!!!
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Don\'t go here during business hours!!!

properties.name: 4-Stair and Smooth Concrete!!!
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Don\'t go during business hours!!!

properties.name: 6-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420You have to move benches to do it, and theres generally no watch on it, but there is allways a chance that someone is using the pavillion... Also, theres a huge hill in front of it, which is cool, and really neat hiking trails, during the leafless days it is awesome to explore!!!

properties.name: 6-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Allmost never anybody here, we have never seen anybody, so we can\'t help you if you do!!!

properties.name: 6-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420I\'m pretty sure that its a six stair, maybe five,... as long as school isn\'t in session, and nobody is using them, you shouldn\'t have any problems!!!

properties.name: Alot of 4-Stairs!!!
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420But there is a fake-cop car that is checked on by real cops, so not during buisness hours, especially because this one fat lady allways threatens to call the cops, along with the MSG Jewlers guy that chases you. DEFINETLY not during buisness hours!!!

properties.name: Benches
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420You can move these benches around to create a bench gap or a runway and ledge, no problems if nobody is there, otherwise don\'t even try!!!

properties.name: Cops Are Here Allmost Every Night!!!
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Theres nothing good anyway, not a good place to pass through!!!

properties.name: Gap
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Its about 3-feet downhill, so you can either ride the hill, or jump it, just watch out for the potholes in the parkinglot when you land... Don\'t go here during business hours!!!

properties.name: Gap
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420This is a small gap that drops a foot, maybe two, and is about a foot wide. Don\'t go here during business hours!!!

properties.name: Gap and 3-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Right next to eachother, don\'t go here during business hours... (Bank Hours)...

properties.name: Hip and Ramp-2-Wall
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420This place is great, but not during schools hours + 1.5 hours after that. You won\'t get kicked out unless you start wall-riding or cussing or making noise, then they\'ll ask you to leave nicely, and you better leave, they don\'t hesitate to use the 911 buttons...

properties.name: Ledge and 2-Stair
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420No disturbances, short platform though...

properties.name: Loading Dock
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420No disturbances, small runway though...

properties.name: Qpipe and Gaps
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420This place is great, but not during schools hours + 1.5 hours after that. You won\'t get kicked out unless you start wall-riding or cussing or making noise, then they\'ll ask you to leave nicely, and you better leave, they don\'t hesitate to use the 911 buttons...

properties.name: Security Guards on Duty
properties.description: Posted by Motorider420Security Guards on Duty, but nice spots if you want to get run-down and ticketed!!!
